To create a UK map heatmap at the Lower Tier Local Authority (LTLA / Unitary Authority) level with ggplot2, you’ll need:

A shapefile (or geojson) of UK local authorities (LTLA/UA level).

A dataset with values you want to plot (e.g., rates, counts, etc.), keyed by local authority code (e.g., lad22cd from ONS).

Joining the shapefile with your data and plotting via geom_sf().

Here’s a reproducible example in R:

